p: In summary, this study reports for the first time the antioxidant and neuroprotective effects of the essential oils obtained by hydrodistillation from the leaves of P. armeniaca and P. domestica. Our results demonstrated a very interesting radical scavenging activity in the ABTS test by all investigated essential oils. P. armeniaca essential oils, particularly P1, were active in inhibiting AChE. On the other hand, P. domestica P6 and P5 were the most active in inhibiting BChE.
